title: Samsung phones with UWB can unlock & start the new Genesis GV60 electric car
content:
We’re slowly moving to a world where the traditional wallet and car keys are things of the past, and everything is handled by your smartphone. This week, Hyundai’s Genesis brand launched the GV60 electric vehicle, and it can be unlocked and started using Samsung smartphones with UWB.

more…

The post Samsung phones with UWB can unlock & start the new Genesis GV60 electric car appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The all-electric Genesis GV60 EV can be unlocked and started using a digital key on select Samsung phones. Here's which ones are compatible.
